entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
